sqlMap.select:
SELECT y.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM( SELECT MEMBER_SEQ AS seq, MEMBER_NM AS memberNm, NVL2(MDN, SUBSTR(MDN, 0, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(MDN, 3, 4)|| '-' || SUBSTR(MDN, 8), '')AS mdn, CONTANCT AS contanct, ADDR AS addr, EMAIL AS email, VST_CNT AS vstCnt, WIN_CNT AS winCnt, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS regDt, VST_DT AS vstDt FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1
AND MEMBER_NM LIKE '%'||#searchValue#||'%'
AND MDN LIKE '%'||#searchValue#||'%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_SEQ ) x
WHERE ROWNUM <= #endNum# ) y WHERE rnum >= #startNum#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MDN = #mdn#

SELECT MEMBER_SEQ AS seq, MEMBER_NM AS memberNm, MDN AS mdn, CONTANCT AS contanct, ADDR AS addr, EMAIL AS email, VST_CNT AS vstCnt, WIN_CNT AS winCnt, VST_DT AS vstDt FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1
AND MDN = #mdn#
AND MEMBER_SEQ = #seq#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FM0000000000') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_SEQ, MEMBER_NM, MDN, CONTANCT, ADDR, EMAIL, VST_CNT, REG_DT, UP_DT, VST_DT ) VALUES ( #seq#, #memberNm#, #mdn#, #contanct#, #addr#, #email#, '1', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #vstDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = #memberNm#, CONTANCT = #contanct#, ADDR = #addr#, EMAIL = #email#, VST_CNT = #vstCnt#, WIN_CNT = #winCnt#, UP_DT = SYSDATE VST_DT = #vstDt# WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #seq#
